title: 1756: The Effectiveness of Full Body vs. Split Workouts for Building Muscle, Adjusting Your Calories for Training & Non-training Days, Frequency vs. Intensity for Gains & More (Listener Live Coaching)
description:
In this episode of Quah (Q & A), Sal, Adam & Justin coach four Pump Heads via Zoom.

  • Mind Pump Fit Tip: Cortisol can be your friend and foe. (4:39)
  • Does Justin’s house want to destroy itself? (22:40)
  • When your wardrobe causes a scene. (26:06)
  • Adam is a little injury-prone. (27:45)
  • Gymnastics is NOT a spectator sport. (28:25)
  • There is weird stuff that happens in the world. (32:02)
  • Adam on his first NBA VR experience and speculates on the future of the technology. (34:57)
  • Feeling cerebral with Organifi’s Pure. (45:45)
  • New flavor alert from Ned. (46:48)
  • Dad life updates: Baby farts, new milestones, and being comfortable under surveillance. (52:15)
  • #ListenerLive question #1 - Should my calories be higher on the days I train or the days I don’t train? (1:01:59)
  • #ListenerLive question #2 - What is more effective for building muscle, body part splits, or full-body workouts? (1:14:24)
  • #LIstenerLive question #3 - How can I add cardio to a strength training program? (1:27:47)
  • #ListenerLive question #4 - What is better for gains, training harder but less often or easier and more often? (1:46:03)

Related Links/Products Mentioned

  • Ask a question to Mind Pump, live! Email: live@mindpumpmedia.com
  • February Promotion: MAPS Performance and MAPS Aesthetic 50% off!! **Promo code “FEB50” at checkout**
  • Managing Stress is a Priority Over Exercise – Mind Pump Blog
  • Why Most HIIT Programs Only Work for Short Periods of Time – Mind Pump Blog
  • A predator could have sent hundreds of blackbirds crashing to their death in Mexico
  • A CryptoPunk NFT Was Recently Sold for $23.7 Million
  • Visit Organifi for the exclusive offer for Mind Pump listeners! **Promo code “MINDPUMP” at checkout**
  • Visit NED for an exclusive offer for Mind Pump listeners!
  • Stockpile – Your Favorite Stocks By The Dollar
  • Visit LivON Labs for an exclusive offer for Mind Pump listeners!
  • How to Undulate Your Calories for Faster Weight Loss & an Improved Metabolism – Mind Pump TV
  • How Phasing Your Workouts Leads to Consistent Plateau Free Workouts – Mind Pump Blog

  • MAPS P.E.D.
  • The Ultimate Mind Pump Programming
  • MAPS Fitness HIIT
